bpp/descriptor.name: Dailybee
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Get Dailybee to transform and digitize your supermarket today.

descriptor.name: Chicken Fillet Nugget Snack
descriptor.short_desc: chicken fillet  nuggets come with a sauce of your choice (nugget/garlic sauce). Bite-sized pieces of tender all breast chicken fillets, marinated in our unique & signature blend, breaded and seasoned to perfection, then deep-fried until deliciously tender, crispy with a golden crust

Bite-sized pieces of tender all breast chicken fillets, marinated in our unique & signature blend, breaded and seasoned to perfection, then deep-fried until deliciously tender, crispy with a golden crust

descriptor.name: Chicken fried Nugget Snack
descriptor.short_desc: chicken fried  nuggets come with a sauce of your choice (nugget/garlic sauce). Bite-sized pieces of tender all breast chicken fried, marinated in our unique & signature blend, breaded and seasoned to perfection, then deep-fried until deliciously tender, crispy with a golden crust

descriptor.name: Chicken Fillet Sandwich
descriptor.short_desc: Chicken fillet wrapped in Arabic bread with our signature garlic sauce, lettuce ,pickles and fries inside. Prepared with care ensuring each and every bite is packed with Mmmm
